title: LOOK hits velodrome on sleek revamped 895 Vitesse carbon track bike
content:
LOOK has a new 895 Vitesse carbon track bike, combining aero tech from this year’s Tokyo Olympics, the previous Rio Olympics, and all the way back to Atlanta in 1996. The new 895 Vitesse is a mid-range reworking of Look’s long-running R96 upgraded, now promising improved aerodynamics and stiffness thanks to the front end of

The post LOOK hits velodrome on sleek revamped 895 Vitesse carbon track bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
